template.title: Digital Marketing Campaign Launch
template.description: Comprehensive digital marketing campaign including strategy development, content creation, social media, advertising, and performance tracking.

tasks.name: Market Research & Analysis
tasks.notes: Analyze target audience, competitors, market trends, customer personas

tasks.name: Campaign Strategy Development
tasks.notes: Define campaign objectives, messaging, channels, success metrics

tasks.name: Content Strategy & Planning
tasks.notes: Create content calendar, plan blog posts, social media content, email campaigns

tasks.name: Creative Asset Development
tasks.notes: Design graphics, videos, banners, landing pages, email templates

tasks.name: Website Landing Page Creation
tasks.notes: Develop campaign-specific landing pages, forms, conversion tracking

tasks.name: Social Media Setup
tasks.notes: Set up social media accounts, profiles, posting schedules

tasks.name: Email Marketing Setup
tasks.notes: Create email templates, automation workflows, subscriber segments

tasks.name: Paid Advertising Setup
tasks.notes: Create Google Ads, Facebook Ads, targeting, budget allocation

tasks.name: SEO Optimization
tasks.notes: Keyword research, on-page SEO, meta tags, content optimization

tasks.name: Campaign Launch
tasks.notes: Go live with all campaign elements, monitor initial performance

tasks.name: Performance Monitoring
tasks.notes: Daily monitoring, analytics review, performance optimization

tasks.name: Campaign Analysis & Reporting
tasks.notes: Compile results, ROI analysis, recommendations for future campaigns
